overview:
Libby leads our internal operations at SolutionSet, including IT. Her focus is driving increased efficiencies and collaboration enabling our team members to spend their days addressing our client needs. With a background steeped in professional services and client delivery, Libby brings a strategic and interdisciplinary perspective to the senior management team.

A founding partner of SolutionSet Digital, and former Director, Web Operations at 3Com, Libby brings over 10 years of experience developing corporate operations strategy, instituting process improvements resulting in cost savings, and demonstrated successes in setting and attaining organizational goals in conjunction with staff accountability. Libby has more than 14 years experience in the high tech sector.
